Input.name: customMods
Input.string: ---------------------------------------------------- --- Simulate Poisonous Concoction --- with Explosive Concoction adds 622 to 933 chaos damage adds 470 to 470 chaos damage (from life flask) 40% chance to poison 15% more attack speed +1% critical strike chance
